Uses of Package
net.sodacan.mode

  • Packages that use net.sodacan.mode 
    Package Description
    net.sodacan.api.module  
    net.sodacan.api.topic  
    net.sodacan.mode  
    net.sodacan.runtime  
  • Classes in net.sodacan.mode used by net.sodacan.api.module 
    Class Description
    Mode
    Mode is a major operational partitioning mechanism in the Sodacan runtime.
  • Classes in net.sodacan.mode used by net.sodacan.api.topic 
    Class Description
    Mode
    Mode is a major operational partitioning mechanism in the Sodacan runtime.
  • Classes in net.sodacan.mode used by net.sodacan.mode 
    Class Description
    BaseMode
    One Base Mode per mode specified in Conf file.
    ClockService
    Instances of this service provide clock services.
    LoggerService  
    MessageBusService
    Provide access to one or more message bus providers.
    Mode
    Mode is a major operational partitioning mechanism in the Sodacan runtime.
    ModeService
    A Mode instance has one ModeService instance per class of service: Logger, Clock, MessageBus, and StateStore.
    StateStoreService
    StateStore could be called Variable Store because the collection of variables for a module comprise the totality of state for that module.
  • Classes in net.sodacan.mode used by net.sodacan.runtime 
    Class Description
    Mode
    Mode is a major operational partitioning mechanism in the Sodacan runtime.
